page.title: 11LAW AND ORDER-2
page.content: Should any major crime occur it may be dealt with by myself at the start of the enquiry,but will be followed up later by investigations from the C.I.D.The few farms have trouble,mainly in the summer,from people trespassing over the crops,riding motorcycles over the land or setting fire to hay,crops or buildings.This occurs infrequently.The local courts are,Teesside Magistrates Courts,held at Middlesbrough,about 5 miles away.I only have to attend the courts when a person whom I have charged or summoned enters a not guilty plea,then I attend and give my evidence,or when that person appeals against the sentence or fine he was given."
